testsuite.name: Scenario: creation fails with too short username and valid password

testcase.name: Given command new user is selected
testcase.classname: Scenario: creation fails with too short username and valid password

testcase.name: When a short username "li" and password "salainen1" and matching password confirmation are entered
testcase.classname: Scenario: creation fails with too short username and valid password

testcase.name: Then user is not created and error "username should have at least 3 characters" is reported
testcase.classname: Scenario: creation fails with too short username and valid password

testcase.name: classMethod
testcase.classname: Scenario: creation fails with too short username and valid password

testsuite.system-out: Scenario: creation is successful with valid username and password ?[90m# ohtu/new_user.feature:3?[0m ?[32mGiven ?[0m?[32mcommand new user is selected?[0m ?[90m# Stepdefs.new_user_selected()?[0m ?[32mWhen ?[0m?[32ma valid username "?[0m?[32m?[1mliisa?[0m?[32m" and password "?[0m?[32m?[1msalainen1?[0m?[32m" and matching password confirmation are entered?[0m ?[90m# Stepdefs.valid_username_and_matching_passwords_are_given(String,String)?[0m ?[32mThen ?[0m?[32ma new user is created?[0m ?[90m# Stepdefs.new_user_is_created()?[0m
